thread.section_title: Hotel Cervantes by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Small compact single room - Lovely location
thread.title_full: Small compact single room - Lovely location - Review of Hotel Cervantes by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sunandfunseeker2000
title: Small compact single room - Lovely location
text:
This hotel is a short walk away from the subway station and is easy to get to from champs elyesee.
I booked a single room and although small it was everything I needed.
I arrived very late and was still welcomed with open arms (thank you to reception )
The hotel has the best breakfast I have never had anything like it. Great choice and very fresh!
Will definitely return as it's lovely to be in Paris but not in the crazy hustle and bustle.
